In late January 2025, Whaley Law Firm forwarded an external email thread regarding CLM# 24711062492 for Abdullahi and Maryan Kassim. The forwarded message originated from Jessa Galosmo and was sent to Maryan Kassim’s Filevine project email address on January 27, 2025 at 08:14:36 EST.

The principal note within the thread is a message from Keri A Hall of Progressive Direct Insurance Co, dated January 27, 2025 at 7:54 AM, to Jessa Galosmo. Keri wrote: “Please find attached a copy of the PIP log for Maryan Kassim.” She provided her contact information: Progressive Direct Insurance Co, PO Box 2930, Clinton, IA 52733; Office: 502.909.3600; Fax: 877-213-7258; Email: khall1@progressive.com. She also listed hours of availability (Monday–Friday, 7:00 AM–4:00 PM EST) and included a confidentiality and privilege notice stating that the contents and any attachments are confidential and intended solely for the addressee; if not the intended recipient, any use, dissemination, distribution, storage, or copying is prohibited, and to notify the sender and destroy the message and attachments if received in error. The email was signed by Keri Hall.

The thread also contains an earlier exchange: on Friday, January 24, 2025 at 1:36 PM, Jessa Galosmo wrote to Keri: “Hi Keri, Please see attached request for updated PIP log.” The chain further includes an earlier message from October 30, 2024 at 9:44 AM, in which Keri wrote to Jessa regarding the PIP portion of the claim for Abdullahi and Maryan Kassim in relation to the MVA of 8/6/24. In that message, Keri asked whether both clients were still treating for their injuries and noted that the completed PIP Application forms had not yet been received. She inquired about any outstanding medical bills or liens to be paid from PIP coverage and stated that Progressive had on file to pay up to $6,000 and reserve $4,000 of the PIP benefits. She requested an update and attached updated PIP payment ledgers for both clients.

The January 27, 2025 email from Keri was forwarded with the PIP log attached, as indicated in the thread. The forwarding and all related messages include the same confidentiality and privilege notices that accompanied the earlier communications. The correspondence closes with the sign-offs from Jessa Galosmo of Whaley Law Firm, including her contact information.
